name: Nimble Beetles: Sticky Fighting Fighter
description:
Description

Four fighters face off at the ultimate test of fighting skill, all for the title of Sticky Fighting Fighter.

I'm sorry to say that I've run out of time and had to upload an unfinished piece. Thank you for playing through our game.

Unfinished elements

1. Diverse and improved sprites

2. Controls screen (ability to change controls, see below for controls)

3. Ability to win

4. Proper and fitting background

5. Stage selection

6. Audio

7. Pause menu

8. Attack effects (Knockdown, knockback, Knockup etc.)

Controls

Player 1 / Player 2

Directions

W / UP

A / LEFT

S / DOWN

D / RIGHT

Punch one

J / NUMPAD 1

Punch two

U / NUMPAD 4

Kick one

K / NUMPAD 2

Kick two

I / NUMPAD 5

(attacks can be used whilst ducking, standing and in the air)
